channel.title: Artificial Intelligence on Ypertex Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Artificial Intelligence on Ypertex Blog

item.title: Humankind Is Expecting Offspring—Are We Ready?
item.description: As foretold in my blog’s opening article, Artificial Intelligence (AI) is a topic that concerns me a lot these days. In particular, I am more concerned about the first and still imperfect Artificial General Intelligence and less about the potentially god-like, almighty Artificial Super Intelligence everyone is talking about. For those of you who are not too familiar with the subject, I will start this article with an introduction and recommend a few links for further reading at the end.
